definitions.definition: Concerned with something else; distracted; giving one's attention elsewhere.
definitions.example: I was preoccupied with a deadline at work, and I forgot his birthday.

definitions.definition: Describing a scientific name that was previously used, a junior homonym.
To distract; to occupy or draw attention elsewhere.
definitions.example: The father tried to preoccupy the child with his keys.

definitions.definition: To occupy or take possession of beforehand.
